title: Torrent™ Blender Features | KitchenAid
description:
Introducing the revolutionary Torrent Blender from KitchenAid®: the first-ever magnetic drive blender for home use. 
The magnetic drive technology lets you lock the pitcher into place and power through your favorite recipes. So you can blend more, and work less.

asset.author: KitchenAid
asset.hookText:
